title: Authorizes racetracks and off-track betting corporations to offer rebates on pari-mutuel wagers made by bettors
summary: Authorizes racetracks and off-track betting corporations to offer rebates on pari-mutuel wagers made by bettors.
lawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
actClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to authorizing the payment of rebates on pari-mutuel wagers
